text:
Hi All,
Thanks, <@U2H3TT8F2> for creating this channel. Now, we as developers had a chance to share our works in Slack also

I've released a new app that integrates HubSpot contacts with Akaunting customers.
<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/finance/accounting/akaunting-216821>

Also created a post about it in HubSpot forums:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/Akaunting-Integration-New-App/m-p/336351/highlight/true#M536>

Please let me know your feedbacks.
Thanks.
